content.description: Starts on low ledge to the left of Constant Gardener and move up and to the right following a series on big ledge on the steep slab.  Joins the top of Control Joint and tops out, watch out for the fern.
content.location: On the left side of the Garden Wall boulder to the right of Constant Gardener.

content.description: Start on a good good edge and make a big move to a nice side pull.  Continue to top on crimps. (Only a select few know what the true meaning of the cryptic initials is).
content.location: On the far right end of the Garden Wall boulder, starts where the initials M.C.T.S are carved into the face.

content.description: Tallest problem on the Garden Wall boulder, follow the arete on the far left end and transitions onto the slab face near the top before topping out.
content.location: Far left side of the Garden Wall Boulder.

content.description:
Start the same as for the Gate, once at the chicken head move right onto a series of good edges and follow to the top.

 4/27/19 Chicken head has broken off of the Gate, use thin crimps/gaston in place of broken jug, now requires delicate high step to get onto the traverse ledges that lead to top out.  New grade V3.
content.location: On the Garden Wall boulder to the right of The Gate.

content.description:
Start on two side pulls low on the boulder to the right of Control Joint and climb up to a chicken head. From there move up to the left making delicate moves on slopers to the top.

 4/27/19 Chicken head has broken off, currently unclimbed with unknown new grade, currently a project please report any new  sends to update grade.
content.location: Right side of the Garden Wall boulder to the right of Control Joint.

content.description: Climb the fist and off hand crack in the middle of the Garden Wall boulder, follows crack to the top.
content.location: Middle of the Garden Wall boulder.

content.description: Tall slab problem on the left side of the Garden Wall boulder.  Starts on underclings and moves straight up the face on small crimps to the top out.
content.location: Left end of the Garden Wall boulder on the tall slab to the right of Lake View arete.

content.description: Long tall slab boulder in the Garden area with several problems on it.
